plot: John Phillips was an undercover agent for the United States. Then his life was taken away after another agent had a secret to keep and decided to pin Phillips for a crime he didn't commit. ...
plot_en: John Phillips was an undercover agent for the United States. Then his life was taken away after another agent had a secret to keep and decided to pin Phillips for a crime he didn't commit. ...

title: The Exile
